## contracts package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Arbitrator](./contracts.arbitrator.md) | This class implements an interface to interact with the arbitrator contract to fetch the arbitration details |
|  [SafientMain](./contracts.safientmain.md) | This class implements an interface for the safient protocol's contract interaction allowing users to create and interact with the safes and the claims |
